name: CaptainMarlene
description:
In the game you control the spacecraft, and in the pilot's seat sits the brave CaptainMarlene.
You have to be very careful to pass near dangerous obstacles in order to get to the desired platform and teleport to the new tunnels of the space base.
CaptainMarlene pilot test. You will be able to bring the newest spacecraft through various trials and go on a trip.


Features
- Atmospheric graphics
- Convenient operation
- Dangerous adventures
